section.title: packages master list of List Packages
section.para: Enter content. The following screen will appear:
The "List Packages" screen displays information on all existing Packages.
To the far right of the list, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
Opens screen for creating a new Package.

Enables you to edit highlighted Packages. The edit screen is the same as that for creating a new Contact—except that when editing, the fields will contain Package information. Double-clicking on a Package will also bring you to the editing screen.
Highlight a Package and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
Highlight a Package and then select this button to remove the Package from the list.
